title: FTX: Court says Sam Bankman-Fried ran FTX as a 'personal fiefdom'
description: FTX's collapse was described in court as "one of most abrupt and difficult" in corporate America.

title: Instagram 'wrong' to take down drill music video
description: Meta's independent appeals body criticises the decision to remove the video and says it must be reinstated.

title: Apple and Google face gaming and mobile browser probe
description: The UK competition watchdog launches a market investigation into cloud gaming and mobile browsers.

title: US tech layoffs: India workers face painful exit from the US
description: Indians are among thousands of educated and skilled immigrant workers laid off by US tech giants.
